description: This file defines a Dart class 'Payment' used for representing payment information within a Flutter mobile application. It includes fields for id, bookingId, amount, status, and method, along with methods for JSON serialization and deserialization.

classes.name: Payment
classes.description: An immutable class representing a payment, with fields for id, bookingId, amount, status, and method, equipped with methods for JSON serialization and deserialization.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Payment instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the Payment instance into a JSON map.
